roleset.name: ask a favor, ask a request
roleset.note: DEMAND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'demand' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'ask'. (from demand.01-v predicate notes)
DEMAND-N NOTES: Roleset based on demand.01. Verbnet class beg 58.2. Framenet class request. Framed by Katie. (from demand.01-n)

example.name: nominal thing demanded
example.text: Belgium decided that investors who *trace* demand the delivery of their securities when they buy shares or domestic bonds will have to pay an additional 100 Belgian francs (about $2.60) for each transaction, bringing the total fee to 200 francs.
example.arg: when they buy shares or domestic bonds

example.name: sentential thing demanded
example.text: When Disney offered to pay Mr. Steinberg a premium for his shares, the New York investor didn't demand the company also pay a premium to other shareholders.
example.arg: the company also pay a premium to other shareholders

example.name: Example with all args
example.text: the ANC 's demands on the government to create a climate fornegotiations
example.arg: to create a climate for negotiations

example.name: arg1
example.text: Sun to meet demand for its newest computers

example.name: One more with args 0 and 1
example.text: Its demands for an Islamic state
